column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " I 'd just like to say , for the record , this room is definitely not perfect .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I thought stakeouts were supposed to be exciting .
#Text=This is n't .
#Text=At all !
#Text=Ooh , I wonder if there 's any snacks in here .
#Text=Hey , look !
#Text=A Pai Sho board !
#Text=Mako , you want to play ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Kind of busy here , bro .
#Text=" Asami says : " I 'll play .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , well , ugh , no offense but I learned street Pai Sho from Shady Shin , and I 'm pretty good .
#Text=So , would n't really be a fair game .
#Text=" Asami says : " So ?
#Text=I learned to play from my dad , the diabolical genius .
#Text=I 'll destroy you .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Well , looks we 've got ourselves a Pai - Shodown .
#Text=Ladies first .
#Text=Uh , I do n't mean to rush you , but let 's speed things up a bit .
#Text=" Asami says : " Why ?
#Text=This game is all about slow , methodical strategy .
#Text=" Bolin says : " No , it 's not .
#Text=This is a fast - paced , edge of your seat , game of chance !
#Text=Do n't think .
#Text=Just go .
#Text=" Asami says : " I do n't know what Shady Shin taught you , but it was n't the real Pai Sho .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh really ?
#Text=I think Mr. Rulebook might disagree with you .
#Text=The origins of Pai Sho date back over ten thousand years .
#Text=It is a game of both strategy and chance .
#Text=Wait , how can it be both ?
#Text=" Asami says : " Let me see that .
#Text=There have been countless variations of Pai Sho through the centuries and each culture has its own rules and variations of the game .
#Text=" Bolin says : " That 's no help at all .
#Text=Korra , as the Avatar , you need to standardize these Pai Sho rules .
#Text=" Korra says : " Okay , I 'll put that on my to - do list , right after bringing back the Air Nation and taking down the group that tried to kidnap me .
#Text=" Bolin says : " That 's cool .
#Text=Whenever you get to it .
#Text=" Mako says : " Assuming we do find Zaheer , what then ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Then I make him talk .
#Text=" Mako says : " He was locked away for thirteen years , Korra , and never broke .
#Text=I do n't think a little bending is going to intimidate this guy .
#Text=" Korra says : " You have a better idea ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Yeah , we spy on them .
#Text=If Aiwei and Zaheer do n't know they 're being watched , they 'll talk freely .
#Text=Then we 'll find out who they are and what they want .
#Text=" Bolin says : " That 's just like Pai Sho !
#Text=In order to defeat your opponent , you first have to know your opponent .
#Text=" Asami says : " Then I guess I know you pretty well .
#Text=I win .
#Text=" Bolin says : " What ?
#Text=Ugh .
#Text=All right , you know what that was just a fluke .
#Text=Best two out of three .
#Text=Oh , come on !
#Text=Best four out of seven .
#Text=Eight out of fifteen .
#Text=Seventeen out of thirty - three ?
#Text=Ha , ha !
#Text=Looks like you 're on the ropes this time .
#Text=" Asami says : " I ca n't believe it .
#Text=You might actually win this one .
#Text=" Bolin says : " No , Pabu ?
#Text=Why ?
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's almost sundown .
#Text=Why has n't Aiwei left yet ?
#Text=" Asami says : " Maybe he sneaked out when you were n't looking .
#Text=" Mako says : " No , I just saw him peeking out of his window fifteen minutes ago .
#Text=It 's in my logbook .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm going over there .
#Text=" Mako says : " Korra , wait !
#Text=You 're going to blow our element of surprise .
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's over , Aiwei !
#Text=Where 's ... ?
#Text=What ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " That 's a weird way to nap .
#Text=" Korra says : " He 's not sleeping .
#Text=He 's meditating .
#Text=Wait !
#Text=Asami , those spirits were trying to tell us something earlier .
#Text=Xai Bau 's Grove is n't on the map because it 's not in the physical world !
#Text=It 's in the Spirit World !
#Text=I 'm going in after him .
#Text=" Mako says : " We 'll watch him in case he wakes up .
#Text=Be careful !
#Text=" Zaheer says : " What happened back in Zaofu ?
#Text=You told me we would n't have any problems getting the Avatar ?
#Text=Because of you , we 've all been compromised .
#Text=" Aiwei says : " No , any evidence was destroyed when my library burned .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " Where is your physical body now ?
#Text=" Aiwei says : " At the Misty Palms Inn .
#Text=But there is no need to worry .
#Text=I was not followed .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " You left a loose end .
#Text=" Aiwei says : " I assure you , no one knows anything about us .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " No , you are the loose end .
#Text=" Korra says : " Zaheer !
#Text=" Zaheer says : " It seems Aiwei was mistaken .
#Text=He was followed .
#Text=" Korra says : " That 's right .
#Text=We knew he 'd lead us straight to you .
#Text=Now , what did you do with him ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " He 'll be spending eternity in the Fog of Lost Souls , which just leaves the two of us .
#Text=" Korra says : " Do n't move , Zaheer .
#Text=You 're going to give me some answers .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " There 's no need for aggression .
#Text=Neither of us has our bending , and I 'm not going anywhere .
#Text=I 'll answer whatever questions you have .
#Text=You deserve that much .
#Text=What would you like to know ?
#Text=" Korra says : " First off , who are you people , and why do you keep trying to take me ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " We are part of a secret society , dedicated to restoring freedom to the world .
#Text=We are the Red Lotus .
#Text=" Korra says : " Red Lotus ?
#Text=Are you related to the White Lotus ?
#Text=" Zaheer says : " We are what the White Lotus was meant to be .
#Text=But after the Hundred Year War , the White Lotus lost its true purpose .
#Text=Its members came out of hiding and openly served the Avatar .
#Text=They became nothing but glorified bodyguards who served corrupt nations .
#Text=So a great man named Xai Bau broke from the White Lotus and began his own society .
#Text=" Korra says : " That 's a great story , but it does n't explain why you tried to take me when I was a kid .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " That was Unalaq 's idea .
#Text=" Korra says : " What ?
#Text=My uncle was part of the Red Lotus ?
#Text="
